uber.introDuration: Time to show the uber logo. Won't display until data is available.
uber.tapInterval: The minimum amount of time between registered taps
uber.updateOnTap: Update wait time and surge pricing on tap
uber.updateInterval: Time between updating the time and surge pricing
uber.staleDataTimeout: The maximum age of the time and surge pricing data before we stop showing it
uber.visibilityTimeout: How long without rendering before the intro is re-enabled
